common.unsubscribe: If you didn't request this email, you can safely ignore it.
common.support: Need help? Contact our support team.
common.securityTip: Security Tip: Never share your password or verification codes with anyone.

welcome.subject: Welcome to {siteName}!
welcome.body: Thank you for creating an account with {siteName}. We're excited to have you on board!
welcome.footer: If you didn't create this account, please contact our support team.

passwordReset.subject: Reset your password
passwordReset.body: We received a request to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password.
passwordReset.expiry: This link will expire in {minutes} minutes.
passwordReset.footer: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.

invite.subject: You've been invited to join {siteName}
invite.instructions: Click the button below to accept your invitation and set up your account.
invite.expiryDays: This invitation will expire in {count, plural, one {# day} other {# days}}.
invite.footer: If you weren't expecting this invitation, you can safely ignore this email.

twoFactorCode.subject: Your verification code is {code}
twoFactorCode.expiry: This code will expire in 10 minutes.
twoFactorCode.footer: If you didn't request this code, please ignore this email.

newLogin.subject: New login to your account
newLogin.body: We noticed a new login to your account. Here are the details:
newLogin.warning: Was this you? If you don't recognize this login, we recommend changing your password immediately and reviewing your active sessions in your account settings.

accountLockout.subject: Your account has been locked
accountLockout.preview: Your account has been temporarily locked due to multiple failed login attempts
accountLockout.body: Your account has been temporarily locked due to {attempts} failed login attempts. This is a security measure to protect your account from unauthorized access.
accountLockout.whatToDo: What should I do? Wait for the lockout to expire, then try again with the correct password.
accountLockout.notYou: Wasn't this you? Change your password immediately and enable two-factor authentication.

emailChange.subject: Verify your new email address
emailChange.body: You requested to change your email address to {email}.
emailChange.expiry: This code will expire in 10 minutes.
emailChange.footer: If you didn't request this email change, please ignore this email and contact support.

twoFactorEmailEnabled.subject: Email Two-Factor Authentication Enabled
twoFactorEmailEnabled.preview: Email 2FA has been enabled on your account
twoFactorEmailEnabled.body: Email-based two-factor authentication has been enabled on your account. You will now receive a verification code via email when signing in.

twoFactorEmailDisabled.subject: Email Two-Factor Authentication Disabled
twoFactorEmailDisabled.preview: Email 2FA has been disabled on your account
twoFactorEmailDisabled.body: Email-based two-factor authentication has been disabled on your account. Your account is now less secure.

totpEnabled.subject: Authenticator App Added
totpEnabled.preview: Authenticator app has been added to your account
totpEnabled.body: An authenticator app (such as Google Authenticator or Authy) has been added to your account for two-factor authentication.

totpDisabled.subject: Authenticator App Removed
totpDisabled.preview: Authenticator app has been removed from your account
totpDisabled.body: The authenticator app has been removed from your account. Your account may be less secure without this additional protection.

passkeyAdded.subject: New Passkey Added
passkeyAdded.preview: A new passkey has been added to your account
passkeyAdded.body: A new passkey has been registered to your account. You can now use it to sign in without a password.

passkeyRemoved.subject: Passkey Removed
passkeyRemoved.preview: A passkey has been removed from your account
passkeyRemoved.body: A passkey has been removed from your account. You will no longer be able to use it to sign in.

passwordChanged.subject: Password Changed
passwordChanged.body: Your account password has been successfully changed. If you made this change, no further action is needed.

emailChanged.subject: Email Address Changed
emailChanged.preview: Your email address has been changed
emailChanged.body: Your email address has been successfully changed.

primaryEmailChanged.subject: Primary Email Changed
primaryEmailChanged.preview: Your primary email address has been changed
primaryEmailChanged.body: Your primary email address has been changed. All future notifications will be sent to your new primary email address.

googleLinked.subject: Google Account Linked
googleLinked.preview: A Google account has been linked to your account
googleLinked.body: A Google account has been linked to your account. You can now sign in using Google.

googleUnlinked.subject: Google Account Unlinked
googleUnlinked.preview: Google account has been unlinked from your account
googleUnlinked.body: The Google account has been unlinked from your account. You will no longer be able to sign in using Google.

accountDeactivated.subject: Account Deactivated
accountDeactivated.body: Your account has been deactivated by an administrator. You will no longer be able to sign in. If you believe this is an error, please contact support.

security.notYouWarning: If this wasn't you, please change your password immediately and contact support.
